Covid death toll higher than current tallies

Covid Death Toll Higher Than Current Tallies

And as I’ve been saying for months, C19 was all over the globe in 2019. This is yet another set of data proving that it was in the US (Washington State) long before it was officially recognized. Probably 3 times as many “C19” deaths before it was even recognized in WA than when they started keeping official reports. The lockdowns begun in March were utterly useless.
